events.description: Nico Hoerner doubles (9) on a soft line drive to left fielder Juan Soto.
Dansby Swanson strikes out swinging. 1 out
Ian Happ singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Manny Machado. Nico Hoerner scores. Ian Happ to 2nd. Throwing error by third baseman Manny Machado.
Seiya Suzuki pops out to shortstop Ha-Seong Kim. 2 outs

Cubs challenged (tag play), call on the field was upheld: Cubs challenged (home-plate collision), call on the field was upheld: Patrick Wisdom singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Juan Soto. Ian Happ out at home on the throw, left fielder Juan Soto to catcher Austin Nola. 3 outs
Trent Grisham lines out to right fielder Seiya Suzuki. 1 out

Christopher Morel walks. Miguel Amaya to 2nd.
Nico Hoerner grounds out to first baseman Alfonso Rivas. Miguel Amaya to 3rd. Christopher Morel to 2nd. 1 out
